text: Kiss is the self-titled first album from the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on February 8, 1974. == Track listing == * Strutter * Nothin' to Lose * Firehouse * Cold Gin * Let Me Know * Kissin' Time * Deuce * Love Theme from Kiss * 100,000 Years * Black Diamond Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1974 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Kiss (Kiss album)
